Granite moves backwards. The missiles blast him down. Mech fluid flies
everywhere.

"Good, now finish the wimp!" Deemos says. He looks up to find that Atma,
Psuedo, and echnosis were gone. He watches to see what Sharpedge would do to
Granite...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Alloran2@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, September 24, 2000 9:02 PM
Subject: Shockaract and other stuff


>
> OOC: Shockaract had been requested by Soulstice first, so it is his.
Sorry
> Dachande
>
> :::Treadshot/Falcon/Snare/Sharpedge:::
>
> Treadshot: I dont think so!
> ::He fires 25 shots at Necromancer::
> --------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
> ---------------------------------------------
> Falcon: I'm Falcon and hes Snare
> Snare: we would like to join your group, since Deathsaurus uses us as
pawns.
> Do you accept?
> --------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
> ---------------------------------------------
> ::Sharpedge gets hit by 11 of the bullets, mostly on his arms.  He runs up
to
> Granite and fires 2 missles at pointbank range::
>
>
